rules_text:
Flash
Deathtouch, lifelink
Whenever Irika, Wielder of Secrets deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {UB}. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: [i]“Having power like this and not using it would be a crime. But not the good type of crime. The boring type.”[/i]
